attributes.action: Bring in new Legislation forcing car manufacturers to only sell eco-friendly vehicles in GB
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mr Blair needs to scrap plans to introduce stealth taxes on British Motorists in the name of the enviroment and realise that the only people who are going to be taxed off the road are the poor.
I suggest that Mr Blair scraps plans for extra taxes and go one step further and go right to the heart of our congestion and enviromental problems.
I believe the Prime Minister should force all Car Manufacturers to only sell enviromentally friendly vehicles in the UK. This would cut our carbon emissions down by around 90% of the current levels.
He could even go one step further and force all new home developments to have solar panels and wind turbines as standard.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with others that already exist because it covers several issues, some not referenced in its title. Please consider rewording, so it does not overlap with existing petitions.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
